cards.name: Lion
cards.description: The king of the jungle. Symbolizes strength and bravery.

cards.name: Elephant
cards.description: The largest land animal. Represents wisdom and memory.

cards.name: Giraffe
cards.description: The tallest animal. Symbolizes vision and foresight.

cards.name: Rhino
cards.description: A powerful creature. Represents protection and stability.

cards.name: Leopard
cards.description: A stealthy predator. Symbolizes agility and cunning.
